title: Strictly partners Saffron Barker and AJ Pritchard hit the red carpet together
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly Come Dancing's Saffron Barker put on a glamorous display in London on Thursday night alongside her pro partner AJ Pritchard .

The pair have high hopes of triumphing in the hit BBC One dance contest, but Saffron has fans worried with a back injury that's meant trouble for rehearsals.

The 19 year-old YouTuber rocked a confident, chic black trouser suit, over a lacy white camisole. She completed the ensemble with some bold eye make-up and blue heeled sandals.

She also carried a matching blue clutch bag with a gold chain.

Saffron wore her blond locks in tousled, flowing waves to frame her face.

(Image: Hewitt / SplashNews.com)

(Image: Hewitt / SplashNews.com)

Dashing AJ, 24, opted for a more extravagant red and black metallic blazer, with a classic bowtie, black trousers and brogues.

They were hitting up the star-studded Global Gift Gala, the proceeds for which went to the Global Gift Foundation which aims to improve the lives of women, children and families all around the globe.

It was hosted by none other than Britain's Got Talent's David Walliams , and prize winners included Simon Cowell taking home the Philanthropist Award and singer Paloma Faith earning the Empowerment Award.

Earlier in the day, Saffron took to her Instagram story to dish to fans about her injury.

(Image: BBC/Guy Levy)

She captioned the clip: "You've probably all seen that I've got injury with my back! My rib has twisted and so therefore all my muscles are having spasms."

She continued that rehearsals were ongoing and she was feeling less under the weather and reassured fans that she wouldn't be quitting.

Later she wrote: "All positivity! Please please please watch this week we've struggled and so will need all ur support but SO excited for this dance!!!"

Saffron and AJ have been surrounded by romance rumours since they were first paired, and despite Piers Morgan's best efforts to get them to say otherwise, they insist they're not an item.

A spokesperson said: "AJ and Saffron are great friends and have been training really hard.

"AJ's focus seems to be on progressing in the show, having failed to pass the semi-final stage three years running."
description: The dancing partners appeared at the Global Gift Gala in London after Saffron's Strictly hopes were threatened by a back injury
